content: **need a new go-to baby blanket in your bag of tricks ** try the strawberry cone baby blanket this blanket is beginner-friendly and works up quickly use the ice cream inspired shades of shown or pull from your stash to build your own gorgeous blanket **pattern highlights** // learn the double_crochet cluster stitch and how to crochet into the back and front loops - it s easy and provides beautiful texture // make it all in one color or use an array of colors // instructions provided to make this blanket any size you want **size** 24 x33 or 30 x38 as written instructions for adjusting the size are given at the end of the pattern **suggested yarn** paintbox cotton aran **hooks used** i 9/5 5 crochet hook
